name: Mothman Rides Again!
description:
Take to the streets as the radical Mothman, showing the kids how its done as you skate, jump, and kickflip to victory. Beware of the townsfolk, as a cryptid must always remain a mystery. Simple and accessible controls make trick combos a breeze! Ride the rails through different environments and shoot for your best score!

Here's a quick playthrough video!

Here's our very early initial design document:

https://mail.google.com/mail/u/0?ui=2&ik=d6c8a90844&attid=0.1&permmsgid=msg-f:16...
